metadata.description: In 1180, Gilad searches for the next in line to serve as Seer of Earth and Stone. But when the Geomancer, a Tibetan monk, faces certain death, he attempts to create a tulpa- a thoughtform duplicate- to serve as his intended successor, a decision whose repercussions will resonate through to the modern day.
metadata.name: Eternal Warrior: Fist & Steel
